name: @userstyles: max-width textareas
description: @userstyles.  Patch:  Over-sized preview images can push the the textarea's scrollbar off screen making it difficult to scroll.  (1) Apply max-width to textareas to fix this. (2) Tab character size set to four.
additional_info:
versions:
1.00:  max-width for textareas.
1.01:  adjust max-width.  set tab character size.
